mapper.select: select * from gb_department_orders as gdo left join gb_distributer_goods as gdg on gdg.gb_distributer_goods_id = gdo.gb_DO_dis_goods_id where gb_department_orders_id = #{value}

select * from gb_department_orders
limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select count(*) from gb_department_orders

select *, ds.gb_department_id 'gb_department_id', ds.gb_department_name 'gb_department_name', ds.gb_department_type 'gb_department_type', ds.gb_department_father_id 'gb_department_father_id', ds.gb_department_is_group_dep 'gb_department_is_group_dep', df.gb_department_id 'dd_gb_department_id', df.gb_department_name 'dd_gb_department_name'
from gb_department_orders as weight_dor left join gb_distributer_goods as dg on dg.gb_distributer_goods_id = weight_dor.gb_DO_dis_goods_id left join gb_distributer_weight_goods as gdwg on gdwg.gb_dwg_dis_goods_id = dg.gb_distributer_goods_id and gdwg.gb_distributer_weight_goods_id = weight_dor.gb_DO_weight_goods_id left join gb_distributer_father_goods as dfg on dfg.gb_distributer_father_goods_id = dg.gb_dg_dfg_goods_father_id left join gb_department as ds on ds.gb_department_id = weight_dor.gb_DO_department_id left join gb_department as df on df.gb_department_id = ds.gb_department_father_id left join gb_department_dis_goods as gddg on gddg.gb_DDG_dis_goods_id = dg.gb_distributer_goods_id and gddg.gb_DDG_department_id = weight_dor.gb_DO_department_id left join gb_department_goods_stock as gdgs on gdgs.gb_dgs_gb_department_order_id = weight_dor.gb_department_orders_id
and weight_dor.gb_DO_weight_total_id = #{weightId}
order by dfg.gb_distributer_father_goods_id, dg.gb_dg_goods_pinyin,weight_dor.gb_DO_department_id
select * from gb_department_orders where gb_DO_dgsr_return_id = #{gbDepartmentGoodsStockReduceId}
mapper.delete:
delete from gb_department_orders where gb_department_orders_id in
#{gbDepartmentOrdersId}
